results.name: Writing into CRs has an effect
results.description: A CR sends PUT/POST requests to the API server to modify resources in response to spec block changes
suggestions: The operator should write into objects to update state. No PUT or POST requests from the operator were recorded by the scorecard.

results.description: All CRDs have an OpenAPI validation subsection
